subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Southern University and Agricultural & Mechanical College
University of Arkansas at Pine Bluff
lead_paragraph: For a lack of progress, 18 Division I teams will miss postseason play in 2013-14, but the Connecticut men’s basketball team has requalified.
snippet: For a lack of progress, 18 Division I teams will miss postseason play in 2013-14, but the Connecticut men’s basketball team has requalified.
